plot: A game of truth or dare ignites latent love. Still Waters Burn features Ian Hart, Claudia Wells, and the last film performance of Darren McGavin (A Christmas Story, The Night Stalker).
title: Still Waters Burn
plot_es: A game of truth or dare ignites latent love. Still Waters Burn features Ian Hart, Claudia Wells, and the last film performance of Darren McGavin (A Christmas Story, The Night Stalker).
plot_en: A game of truth or dare ignites latent love. Still Waters Burn features Ian Hart, Claudia Wells, and the last film performance of Darren McGavin (A Christmas Story, The Night Stalker).
